name: Preparing takes 2d10 Hours minus ritual leader's Intelligence bonus, minimum of 1 hour. After this the leader makes a -30 Forbidden Lore (Daemonology) test, modified based on the quality of the preparations and how well they were followed. Every degree of Success provides +5 to bind the Daemon, each Degrees of Failiure imposes -5 to bind the daemon.

system.novice: The Daemonhost's body writhes with foul creatures whose toxins ooze over its form. It gains the Toxic (4) Trait.

description.value: Novice: The Daemonhost's body writhes with foul creatures whose toxins ooze over its form. It gains the Toxic (4) Trait.
